## Floating class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Floating point Decimal numbers are used to calculate values for RMM pools.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Floating 
```

## Remarks

However, sometimes the result of these math operations can return a value that has more decimal places than the token which the amount represents the value of.

Higher decimal values on lower decimal tokens will truncate the amount once it reaches on-chain. This is because truncation is used in computing when division is done with integers (e.g. in the EVM) and the answer must be an integer.

This class is aware of this and will truncate after any math operation.

|  [ZERO](./rmm-sdk.floating.zero.md) | <code>static</code> | [Floating](./rmm-sdk.floating.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Floating class with raw value of 0.0. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(adder)](./rmm-sdk.floating.add.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Scales up, adds scaled values, downscales back. |
|  [div(divider)](./rmm-sdk.floating.div.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Divides this scaled by scaled divider. |
|  [divCeil(divider)](./rmm-sdk.floating.divceil.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> |
|  [downscaleInteger(value)](./rmm-sdk.floating.downscaleinteger.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Divides <code>value</code> by this scale factor and truncates it to this decimals. |
|  [from(value, decimals)](./rmm-sdk.floating.from.md) | <code>static</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Instantiates a Floating value from a value with default decimals of 18. |
|  [mul(multiplier)](./rmm-sdk.floating.mul.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Multiplies scaled multiplier and this value, downscales back. |
|  [mulDiv(multiplier, divider)](./rmm-sdk.floating.muldiv.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Multiplies scaled multiplier and this value, divides by scaled divider, downscales back. |
|  [sub(subtractor)](./rmm-sdk.floating.sub.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Scales up, subtracts scaled values, downscales back. |
|  [toFixed(decimals)](./rmm-sdk.floating.tofixed.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Normalized value fixed to <code>decimals</code>. This will be rounded up. |
|  [toString()](./rmm-sdk.floating.tostring.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Raw value as a string. |
|  [upscaleInteger(value)](./rmm-sdk.floating.upscaleinteger.md) |  | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Multiplies <code>value</code> by this scale factor and floors it. |
